title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 4900.3 - Records access officers
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 4900.3 - Records access officers

State Regulations

The chairman of the authority shall be responsible for
insuring compliance with the rules set forth in this Part, and shall designate
one or more persons as records access officer(s) by name or specific job title
and business address, who shall coordinate, for the authority and its
subsidiaries, responses to requests for information. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
4900.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
